016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.converter;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020import java.util.HashSet;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Set;
023
024import javax.faces.application.FacesMessage;
025import javax.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity;
026import javax.faces.convert.Converter;
027import javax.faces.convert.ConverterException;
028
029import lombok.AccessLevel;
030import lombok.Getter;
031
032/**
033 * TestData Store for Test Items which will be used by
034 * {@link AbstractConverterTest}<br>
035 * Class is prepared to be used as Fluent Interface
036 *
037 * @param <T> type of Test Item value
038 */
039public class TestItems<T> {
040
041    /**
042     * Items that are used for testing
043     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
044     */
045    @Getter(AccessLevel.MODULE)
046    private final List<ConverterTestItem<T>> validObjectTestItems = new ArrayList<>();
047
048    /**
049     * Items that are used for testing
050     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
051     * but are invalid {@link Object}s
052     */
053    @Getter(AccessLevel.MODULE)
054    private final List<ConverterTestItem<T>> invalidObjectTestItems = new ArrayList<>();
055
056    /**
057     * Items that are used for testing
058     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
059     */
060    @Getter(AccessLevel.MODULE)
061    private final List<ConverterTestItem<T>> validStringTestItems = new ArrayList<>();
062
063    /**
064     * Items that are used for testing
065     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
066     */
067    @Getter(AccessLevel.MODULE)
068    private final List<ConverterTestItem<T>> invalidStringTestItems = new ArrayList<>();
069
070    @Getter(AccessLevel.MODULE)
071    private final Set<String> roundtripValues = new HashSet<>();
072
073    /**
074     * Adds roundtrip String values to be tested. See
075     * {@link AbstractConverterTest#shouldRoundTripValidData()}
076     *
077     * @param roundtripValue the values to be roundtrip converted
078     * @return TestItems reference to this object
079     */
080    public TestItems<T> addRoundtripValues(final String... roundtripValue) {
081        roundtripValues.addAll(Arrays.asList(roundtripValue));
082        return this;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Adds testData to be used for testing
087     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
088     * Test item must fail with {@link ConverterException}
089     *
090     * @param value T invalid value which should cause a {@link ConverterException}
091     * @return TestItems reference to this object
092     */
093    public TestItems<T> addInvalidObject(final T value) {
094        return this.addinValidObjectTestItem(value, null, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, null);
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Adds testData to be used for testing
099     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
100     * Test item must fail with {@link ConverterException}
101     *
102     * @param value   T invalid value which should cause a
103     *                {@link ConverterException}
104     * @param message which should be set within the {@link ConverterException}
105     * @return TestItems reference to this object
106     */
107    public TestItems<T> addInvalidObjectWithMessage(final T value, final String message) {
108        return this.addinValidObjectTestItem(value, null, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, message);
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Adds testData to be used for testing
113     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
114     * Test item should pass without {@link ConverterException}
115     *
116     * @param value valid value which should cause a {@link ConverterException}
117     * @return TestItems reference to this object
118     */
119    public TestItems<T> addValidObject(final T value) {
120        return this.addValidObjectTestItem(value, null, null, null);
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Adds testData to be used for testing
125     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
126     * Test item should pass without {@link ConverterException} and the result
127     * should be the same as the given converterResult
128     *
129     * @param value           valid value which should cause a
130     *                        {@link ConverterException}
131     * @param converterResult the String to be returned by
132     *                        {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
133     * @return TestItems reference to this object
134     */
135    public TestItems<T> addValidObjectWithStringResult(final T value, final String converterResult) {
136        return this.addValidObjectTestItem(value, converterResult, null, null);
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * Adds testData to be used for testing
141     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
142     * Test item must fail with {@link ConverterException}
143     *
144     * @param value invalid String-value which should cause a
145     *              {@link ConverterException}
146     * @return TestItems reference to this object
147     */
148    public TestItems<T> addInvalidString(final String value) {
149        return this.addStringTestItem(false, null, value, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, null);
150    }
151
152    /**
153     * Adds testData to be used for testing
154     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
155     * Test item must fail with {@link ConverterException}
156     *
157     * @param value   invalid String-value which should cause a
158     *                {@link ConverterException}
159     * @param message which should be set within the {@link ConverterException}
160     * @return TestItems reference to this object
161     */
162    public TestItems<T> addInvalidStringWithMessage(final String value, final String message) {
163        return this.addStringTestItem(false, null, value, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, message);
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * Adds testData to be used for testing
168     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
169     * Test item should pass without {@link ConverterException}
170     *
171     * @param value valid String-value which should pass without
172     *              {@link ConverterException}
173     * @return TestItems reference to this object
174     */
175    public TestItems<T> addValidString(final String value) {
176        return this.addStringTestItem(true, null, value, null, null);
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Adds testData to be used for testing
181     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
182     * Test item should pass without {@link ConverterException} and the result
183     * should be the same as the given converterResult
184     *
185     * @param value           valid String-value which should pass without
186     *                        {@link ConverterException}
187     * @param converterResult the String to be returned by
188     *                        {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
189     * @return TestItems reference to this object
190     */
191    public TestItems<T> addValidStringWithObjectResult(final String value, final T converterResult) {
192        return this.addStringTestItem(true, converterResult, value, null, null);
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Adds testData to be used for testing
197     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
198     * that defines a valid Object
199     *
200     * @param value           T value to be validated
201     * @param converterResult the String to be returned by
202     *                        {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
203     * @param level           {@link Severity} represent message severity, usually
204     *                        {@link FacesMessage#SEVERITY_ERROR}
205     * @param message         which should be set within the
206     *                        {@link ConverterException}
207     * @return TestItems reference to this object
208     */
209    private TestItems<T> addValidObjectTestItem(final T value, final String converterResult, final Severity level,
210            final String message) {
211        final var item = new ConverterTestItem<T>();
212        item.setTestValue(value);
213        item.setStringValue(converterResult);
214        item.setValid(true);
215        item.setErrorMessage(message);
216        item.setSeverity(level);
217        validObjectTestItems.add(item);
218        return this;
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * Adds testData to be used for testing
223     * {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
224     * that defines an invalid Object
225     *
226     * @param value           T value to be validated
227     * @param converterResult the String to be returned by
228     *                        {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
229     * @param level           {@link Severity} represent message severity, usually
230     *                        {@link FacesMessage#SEVERITY_ERROR}
231     * @param message         which should be set within the
232     *                        {@link ConverterException}
233     * @return TestItems reference to this object
234     */
235    private TestItems<T> addinValidObjectTestItem(final T value, final String converterResult, final Severity level,
236            final String message) {
237        final var item = new ConverterTestItem<T>();
238        item.setTestValue(value);
239        item.setStringValue(converterResult);
240        item.setValid(false);
241        item.setErrorMessage(message);
242        item.setSeverity(level);
243        invalidObjectTestItems.add(item);
244        return this;
245    }
246
247    /**
248     * Adds testData to be used for testing
249     * {@link Converter#getAsObject(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, String)}
250     *
251     * @param valid           indicating whether it is a valid or invalid item
252     * @param value           T value to be validated
253     * @param converterResult the String to be returned by
254     *                        {@link Converter#getAsString(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent, Object)}
255     * @param level           {@link Severity} represent message severity, usually
256     *                        {@link FacesMessage#SEVERITY_ERROR}
257     * @param message         which should be set within the
258     *                        {@link ConverterException}
259     * @return TestItems reference to this object
260     */
261    private TestItems<T> addStringTestItem(final boolean valid, final T value, final String converterResult,
262            final Severity level, final String message) {
263        final var item = new ConverterTestItem<T>();
264        item.setTestValue(value);
265        item.setStringValue(converterResult);
266        item.setValid(valid);
267        item.setErrorMessage(message);
268        item.setSeverity(level);
269        if (valid) {
270            validStringTestItems.add(item);
271        } else {
272            invalidStringTestItems.add(item);
273        }
274        return this;
275    }
276}
